person.persName: James Eversole (Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Eversole. Father of Margaret and Abner Eversole. Farmer in Owsley County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from January 15, 1862 to November 1862. Reported as deserted in November 1862. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from February 1863 to March 1864. Served as a captain in the Three Forks Battallion (U.S.A.) in 1865.
